official-title.#text: To provide for the release of the property interests retained by the United States in certain land conveyed in 1954 by the United States, acting through the Director of the Bureau of Land Management, to the State of Oregon for the establishment of the Hermiston Agricultural Research and Extension Center of Oregon State University in Hermiston, Oregon.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives May 28, 2014.

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

quote.#text: Hermiston Agricultural Research and Extension Center

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Director of the Bureau of Land Management

quote.#tail: means the State of Oregon (acting through the Oregon State Board of Higher Education on behalf of Oregon State University).

header.#text: Release of property interests in Bureau of Land Management land conveyed to the State of Oregon for establishment of Hermiston Agricultural Research and Extension Center

quote.#tail: on the Map, is hereby released without consideration.

text.#text: Any reservation or reversionary interest retained by the United States to the approximately 290 acres in Hermiston, Oregon, depicted as

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall execute and file in the appropriate office a deed of release, amended deed, or other appropriate instrument reflecting the release of retained interests under
